about_the_game:
• Play different Champions from various genres
  • Build decks with diverse strategies
  • Choose your own spiritual creature
  • Utilize all your techniques to triumph over adversaries

Features

  • Each genre features unique Champions who can only use cards from their genre or common decks. Build your own deck based on each character's abilities.
  • Champions will upgrade in realms during battles, becoming stronger. You can also invest resources to upgrade your characters more quickly.
  • Choose spiritual creature wisely; they can compensate for Champion weaknesses or enhance their strengths.

Mode

  • Single-player mode: Offers a linear storyline experience with fixed decks or a dynamic deck-building challenge against endlessly enhancing enemies.
  • Multiplayer battles: Involve matching with friends or unfamiliar players using your own decks.

short_description: A VR card battle game based on Chinese traditional mythology and the Spirit of Kung Fu. You will play different Champions in the story and weave their journeys. Build your sorcery deck, rein in your creatures, and use all your techniques to triumph over adversaries on your path.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
